complete-cq-notification-complete: Hooray!! you have completed this quest
index-howto-stage1: Find the location by following the instructions and hints.
index-howto-stage2: The QR provides some information about the location.
index-howto-stage3: Found the location? Search for a QR and scan it!
index-howto-stage4: The quest is against the clock. Be efficient and finish in time!
item-notification-found: Hooray!! you have found this item!
item-notification-skipped: Too bad... You had to skip this item.
item-button-last: This was the last item, click here to see how you have done!
map-way-back: Find your way back to the starting point using this map.
load-notification-1: Thanks for using the CityQuest Mobile app!
load-notification-2: Apparently you have not yet configured this Cityquest application.
load-notification-3: Please enter the quest key below.
